definition: lit. opening a book is profitable (idiom); the benefits of education

sentences.english: This article can make your open a book good below the hope.
sentences.chinese: 希望下面这篇文章能够使你开卷有益。

sentences.english: Not until then did I understand reading benefits a lot.
sentences.chinese: 直到那时我才理解了开卷有益的含义。

sentences.english: To open a book is always beneficial. Reading can help us to accumulate our knowledge and enrich our life.
sentences.chinese: 开卷有益，读书能让我们增长知识，丰富课余生活。
